summary: Manages the inference schedule for denoising diffusion implicit models, handling beta schedules, timestep spacing, variance computation, sample clipping, dynamic thresholding, and input scaling, and executes diffusion steps (including parallelized variants) to transform noisy latent representations into final outputs.
business_intent: Provides a flexible, high‑performance scheduler that developers can integrate into diffusion‑based generative AI pipelines to control sample quality, speed, and stability during image or video generation.
